website_summaries.verdict: The Jabra Vox is ideal for those seeking earphones with booming, sub-woofer-like bass, but it lacks definition in the high-mid range.
pros: Seriously powerful bass response for low-end addicts
Well built, with tangle-resistant cable and inline remote and microphone for Android and iOS devices
cons: Doesn't offer well-balanced audio performanceâ€”for bass fiends only
The included app, while free, isn't very useful

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer corded headphones, because I don't have to remember to charge them! These sound terrific, especially for the price. Bass, treble, and midrange all sound good. The downloadable Jabra software has a graphics equalizer built into it, and does an excellent job of manipulating the frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Rick K.

customer_reviews.title: OK sound quality not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 06/2015 after about two months one of the aluminum pieces fell off no big deal they still worked fine and the sounds was good. In 11/2016 one the ear buds quit working I used them daily at the gym but did not abuse them in anyway. A little disappointed they quit after a year and a half, but the sound quality was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Damron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but not if you have tiny ears
customer_reviews.text: I have really small ears. These things hurt to put in, and they don't stay in very well, especially if I go to the gym! However, the sound quality is amazing. They're noise-canceling, so when I go somewhere and I just want to listen to my music or audiobook, I don't have to worry about outside noise mixing. also they get tangled really easily and they're hard to un-tangle because of the plastic coating on the cords, but really, all headphones get tangled, so I can't really complain about that. That being said: don't use these while driving. The last thing you want is to not hear a horn or a siren. Other than that, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: haleybop

customer_reviews.title: Initially Good
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality if average- but the iOs integration makes it great. Build quality is generally good. I was slightly disappointed when the side with the volume buttons started cutting out after less than a month of use. Mind you it still works, but only if the volume slider has been jiggled right.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Only What Matters: Booming
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. These are the best buds i've stumbled upon for the price. Bass is booming, nice fit. Very easy to untangle.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyWhatMatters

customer_reviews.title: I really love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really love these headphones, it works perfectly. I used them all the time, playing music, talking on the phone, and watching movies. The sound quality is great, and the easy assess volume control button and the ability to hand up a call, are all added features about this headset. I highly recommend these headset.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshe

customer_reviews.title: They sound fine and are well constructed
customer_reviews.text: If you have small ear canals--these are not for you. I typically use the smallest silicone "caps" on all my earbuds and these--even with the smallest caps--are still way too big. They sound fine and are well constructed, but won't offer good of noise isolation if you have small "ear holes"
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: remote broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: the inline remote will no longer turn music on/off for my iphone 5. volume still works occasionally. disappointing for such a short period of use (october 14 2013 - january 15 2014). i know these don't last forever, but three months!
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones, good sound, have held up so far, about a month into the purchase (some headphones don't last that long). Only issue is that when the microphone apparently picks up a TON of ambient noise so the person I'm talking to cannot hear me at all if I'm outside or anywhere with a lot of noise. Most headphone microphones I've bought have this issue, and oddly the free headphones that come with the iPhone have always been the best at that.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Elenbark

customer_reviews.title: I got no information when buying it that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I got no information when buying it that it is only made for iPhone,and using on other phone,the control system don't work at all,why not indicate in the description?
customer_reviews.author: Luyafeng

customer_reviews.title: it doesnt has a good isolation, but the áudio quality is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The headphone does not fits well, it doesnt has a good isolation, but the áudio quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Mario Correia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad Quality, I didn't Expected that's sounds like crap, so no star,
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Worst sound performance through a headphone I've ever heard.
customer_reviews.text: Consider this as a sincere review and this crap not even worth for 5$. My iphone 5 earbuds and Bose OE2 are gems compared to this.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sound was good but not fully android-compatible
customer_reviews.text: Sound was good but the earphones was not fully compatible with android phone. The button could only be used to pause/play.
customer_reviews.author: Sze Chao

customer_reviews.title: Not the absolute best, but still worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: The Jabra VOX are great all together. They have a great sound, which is one of the most important factors, and the ear gels don't even feel like they are there. The only downside is that they aren't designed to fit everyone. They fit me fine but to my brother they are uncomfortable and slip out. Another downside is that the remote doesn't work with my Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge which is a bummer since I use these for work. It can at least pause/play/ skip songs and the mic does work fine I've talked on the phone and there have been no problems. The earpiece is not made to fit everyone so buy at your own discrestion.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Berumen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fitting sound
customer_reviews.text: These sound wonderful! The fit adds to the sound performance. The way that they curve, creates a secure yet light fit. Nice highs, not over pitched, decent mid's and smooth lows make these a very balanced set of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for S4 users
customer_reviews.text: Many of the standard headphone functions did not work with my Galaxy S4. Had to request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Romulo Novillo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: (Amazon subsidiary) and I have to say I am sorely disappointed. You see how the body is perpendicular to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these off Woot! (Amazon subsidiary) and I have to say I am sorely disappointed. You see how the body is perpendicular to the earbud. Well that keeps the earbud from going into the ear enough for them to ACTUALLY WORK. The result is they are hideously uncomfortable AND they sound bad! If the earbud was extended another few milometers, it might be fine, but they totally screwed the design, so they're pretty much useless. I don't really understand what could possibly be in that huge zeppelin on the end anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Fred.Up

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: These had excellent sound quality and felt durable. Only problem is, they kept popping out of my ears. I tried adjusting them for size, but none of the attachments fit me. I guess we are all different. If you're the type of person for whom these new in-ear silicone ear pieces fit well, these may do you well, but for me, I'll have to stick with traditionally-shaped earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Superior Stereo Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I tried so many portable headsets/earbuds and by far Jabra VOX is the best. They don't fall out of my ears, kink like most headsets and comes with a cool black bag for storage and two extra pair of bud replacements. Wish the bag was a bright color, so it is easier to find. I highly recommend this product. Although $99.00 is a bit steep for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They come packaged very nicely!
customer_reviews.text: These are earphones that have been packaged very nicely, but they didn't look comfortable and as it turns out they are not comfortable for a very long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: DebraJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought them a few years ago as positively reviewed for having pretty good sound quality and felt durable. They attach very well to ear canal and create a "near noise-free" sensation. On the other hand, neither multi-function button nor volume button would work with most phones I had - couple of Androids, Windows Phones and an iPhone 6s. Unfortunately, they aren't as resistant as I expected as the cord cover began to dry-out peel off and eventually broke down about two weeks ago. Having had several Jabra/GN Netcon devices over the years many of them still fully functional I'm overall disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Leitão

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISED
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds are very comfortable! That is what surprised me. They also came with a durable and nice case to store them in. Looking for some ear buds? Give these a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thompson

product_meta.title: Jabra VOX Corded Stereo Headphones
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingMAXIMUM SOUND MEETS MAXIMUM PORTABILITY. Optimized for superior sound and performance with portable devices, Jabra Vox really packs a punch. Play or pause music, skip tracks and take calls with ease by using controls on the cord instead of searching around for your phone. Vox’ s sculpted design is based on professional in-ear monitors for musicians that give maximum space for powerful sound and strong bass. We partnered with Dolby to bring you Dolby Digital Plus via our Jabra Sound app, which provides a rich, full-spectrum sound that brings your device to life and adds extra depth and dimension to your music. Small but tough -Vox is constructed from premium materials and thoroughly tested for ultimate durability and performance. With reinforced, square, tangle-free cables tested to withstand 15 kg of pull force and SnagIt. Get the perfect fit with specially designed ColorCore EarGels for enhanced comfort and deep sound. Vox' s ear buds are engineered to rest comfortably for extended use.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


MAXIMUM SOUND MEETS MAXIMUM PORTABILITY
REASONS TO CHOOSE JABRA VOX
 * High definition Dolby Digital Plus enhanced sound
 * Ultimate portability & unrivaled durability
 * In-line controls to easily manage calls and tracks

SIZE MATTERS
Especially when earphones so small command massive sound like Jabra Vox. Optimized for superior sound and performance with portable devices - Vox really packs a punch. Play or pause music, skip tracks and take calls with ease by using in-line controls instead of searching around for your phone.

MASSIVE SOUND
Vox’s sculpted design is based on professional in-ear monitors for musicians that give maximum space for powerful sound and strong bass. We’ve partnered with Dolby to bring you high definition sound enhanced by Dolby Digital Plus. With Jabra’s exclusive Sound App, Dolby Digital Plus delivers a rich, full-spectrum even when you’re on the go.

ULTIMATE DURABILITY
Small but tough – Vox is constructed from premium materials and thoroughly tested for ultimate durability and performance. With reinforced, square, tangle-free cables tested to withstand 15 kg of pull force and SnagIt magnets for easy unwinding when you need to grab them & go.

COMFORT & EASE OF USE
Get the perfect fit with specially designed ColorCore EarGels for enhanced comfort and deep sound. Vox’s earbuds are engineered to rest comfortably for extended use.

EXCLUSIVE JABRA SOUND APP
Get an enhanced music experience with the Jabra Sound App – a music player that gives you the full Dolby Digital Plus sound and more. Use the App to create and browse through playlists, share music and adjust the graphic equalizer so you can play your tracks as you want to hear them.

MUSIC & CHAT
 * Pause/play music* Tap the multi-function button
 * Speaker volume** Tap the volume + or volume - button
 * Answer/end call* Tap the multi-function button. Music will automatically pause
 * Reject call* Press and hold (2 sec) the multi-function button
 * Redial last number* Double-tap the multi-function button
 * Skip track forward/backward* Double-tap the multi-function button to skip track forward. Triple-tap the multi-function button to skip track backwards

* Phone dependent
** Apple devices only

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Jabra Vox earphones, protective bag, quick start guide, 3 ColorCore EarGel sizes for custom fit

FEATURES AND SPECIFICATIONS
 * High definition Dolby Digital Plus enhanced sound via exclusive Jabra Sound App
 * Optimized sound excellence with portable devices
 * In-line controls for easy music and call management
 * Sculpted design based on professional in-ear monitors for musicians - provides maximum space for bass
 * Life proof - designed and tested for ultimate portability
 * Premium cables: Square, tangle-free cables reinforced with Liquid Crystal Polymer. SnagIt magnets for easy unwinding. Tested to withstand 15 kg of pull force.
 * Premium comfort: ColorCore EarGels for individual comfort
 * Superior call quality – hear and be heard
 * Connects with all devices with a 3.5 mm jack connector – computers, phones, tablets and more

feature_bullets: Jabra Sound app provides High Definition Dolby Digital Plus enhanced sound
Unrivaled durability and tangle free cords are made for use while on the go
Touch controls on the headphone turntable for easy music and phone call management
ColorCore EarGels for enhanced comfort and deep sound
